channel.title: Gauntlet Community Open Gaming: Games with Seats!
channel.description:
We have a few games for GCOG, our free online convention, with open seats. That's coming up this next weekend, Sept. 22nd to 25th. (I'm listing the times below as US Eastern-- times will show up in your timezone on the calendar itself.
Bluebeard's Bride Thursday at 1400 https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NABB65kil6aO-A62MZA
Space Carnival (Scum & Villainy / Voidheist hack one-shot) Thursday at 1400 https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N92L2_xQy5q3Z-6_W5z
Hunter: the Reckoning Friday at 1630 https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N93uS55AtDeIbbcmBO-
Hunter: the Reckoning Saturday at 1630 https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N93ui2OiZzORIN3yBbX
# Havoc Brigade! Saturday at 0900 https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NB-BYeMQGBzvsgSgCzy

@edige23 wrote:

We have a few games for GCOG, our free online convention, with open seats. That’s coming up this next weekend, Sept. 22nd to 25th. (I’m listing the times below as US Eastern-- times will show up in your timezone on the calendar itself.
